introduction.text.one: I’m a Product Manager with a background in development. I help teams turn complex requirements into digital products that make sense for both users and the business.I started my career writing code and solving detailed technical problems. Over time, I became more interested in the why behind what we build — understanding user needs, aligning stakeholders, and creating products that have a real impact.
introduction.text.two: Today, I work as a Product Owner, focusing on bringing together people, ideas, and technology. I enjoy creating the structure and clarity that help teams build digital products that truly work for users and the business.
introduction.text.three: I’ve worked on B2B and B2C products — always balancing business goals, user needs, and technical feasibility. I enjoy connecting different perspectives: business stakeholders, designers, and developers. My background in QA and frontend development helps me speak all three “languages” and find common ground when things get complex.
introduction.text.four: What motivates me most is creating solutions for real user problems — building things that genuinely help customers.
selected.projects.title: Coding Projects
selected.projects.text.one: These are some of the projects I've worked on, both personl and work related.
selected.projects.text.two: If you want to see more of my work please visit my Github account.
labranda.title: Labranda Hotels
labranda.description: One of my last work projects, a booking portal for the Labranda hotels, where I created most of the components.
trafalga.title: Healthcare landing page
trafalgar.description: Custom design implementation for a Homepage created in React using Styled Components. Deployed with Firebase.
gatsby.title: Gatsby - Contentful blog
gatsby.description: React application created using GatsbyJs, GraphQL and Contentful. Deployed with Netlify.
estate.title: Real estate market
estate.description: Custom design implementation in ReactJs. Used filters and  query strings. Deployed with Firebase.
feedback.title: Feedback form
feedback.description: Radio button based selection form. ReactJs, Styled Components, Contenful Management API. Deployed with Vercel.
event.creator.title: Event creator
event.creator.description: Event creating app, displays the existing participants, add own event, login. React forms, NextJs, styled components, axios.
visuals.text.one: I also have a passion for photography, especially portraits and landscapes. For pictures, you can visit my
required.valid.email: A valid email address is required
online.shop.title: Online Shop
online.shop.description: An online shop created with ReactJs, Styled Components, Redux. Used mock data and deployed with firebase
